scripts.uitest-all: npm run-script prepare-build && npm run-script uitest

releases.body:
Hi guys, Christmas 🎄 🎁  is coming and it's really a good time to share Kaku as a Christmas gift with your friends ! In this release, there are tons of things got fixed and improved : 
1. added Play Queue !!! 😄😄😄
2. added Persian langue 🚶 
3. added Windows 32 bit build 😉 
4. added REAL autoupdate feature ! You can now sit back and do nothing for new release in the future 🏆 
5. changed media keys to global, so now you can play games and use ⏯➡️⬅️ media keys to control Kaku at the same time 💯 
6. updated translations 🔤 
7. improved Player, right now it works better and smoother ✈️ 
8. fixed a bug that users can't use online DJ 💪 
9. fixed a bug that users can't copy and paste in certain cases ☕️ 
10. fixed a bug that users can't sync tracks on Dropbox 🔄 
11. thanks @funilrys for maintaining Arch Linux branch for Kaku 🐺 
12. thanks @neighborhood999 for refactoring some codes to make Kaku better 👍
13. other minor improvements 😮 

This is really an awesome release and hope you guys love it, see you guys next time 😃 

## 

Some social medias that you should know and follow for latest news 😆 
1. Twitter: https://twitter.com/KakuPlayer
2. Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/kaku.rocks
3. Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/chlSNf

After 6 months, it's time to release 1.8.0 :) Here comes some awesome things that you can't miss !
1. Added following new languages: Slovenščina 🇸🇮 , ‏العربية‏ 🇦🇪 , Dansk 🇩🇰 , Svenska 🇸🇪 , Portuguese (Brazil) 🇧🇷  , Nederlands (België) 🇧🇪 , Polski 🇵🇱 ,  Bahasa Indonesia 🇮🇩 , Italiano 🇮🇹
2. Added "Play tracks randomly" feature, yeahhhh 🎵 
3. Added new emoji picker to chatting room, happy chatting ! 🏆 
4. Added AppTray so you can easily access Kaku from your toolbar ⚙ 
5. Added a script for linux users to create desktop icon easily 🍭 
6. Rewrite tons of core codes and make application more stable 🌶 
7. Improved UI a little bit to make it look cleaner ✏️  
8. Other small improvements 👍 

This release is a big improvement and so many new languages were added by contributors ! You guys rock :)

Hi all, finally we released 1.7.0 !!! Sorry for taking so long, but whatever, we made it ! Here comes the release notes : 
1. Added Chomecast support, you can know cast video with chromecast 👍 
2. Added Korean translation 🇰🇷  and Čeština translation 🇨🇿
3. Added Q&A Links 💯 
4. Added the feature to keep played tracks in History panel 👊 
5. Changed the way how shortcut works 🔢 
6. Automatically update core modules when bootup ! 🏆 
7. Updated translations for all languages 🙇 
8. Several bugfixes 🐛 

That's all we got for this milestone, hope you guys love it !!!

Hi all, we just released Kaku 1.6.1 and here comes the release notes : 
1. Fixed problems that tracks can't be played on YouTube platform. :notes: 
2. Fixed the bumping bug when you try to access the panel with lots of tracks. :jack_o_lantern: 
3. Added a button in Settings Page to let users "Update Player" when tracks can't be played. :+1: 
4. Added special thanks panel ! :bow: 
5. Cleaned up some unused codes and files. :clap: 

That's all ! Hope you guys did enjoy the moment during Christmas holidays :smile:

Yeah ~ we just released Kaku 1.6.0 and let's see what's been added :
1. Added donation link :money_with_wings:
2. Added comment button to let you leave comment on our FB page easily :facepunch:
3. Added two different views for Tracks ! :fireworks:
4. Changed default volume to 50% :sound:
5. Fixed the bug that last video will be played twice in "play all" mode :notes:
6. Fixed duplicated options to youtube-dl :walking:
7. Fixed Windows MAX LENGTH problem :smirk: 
8. File size has been reduce almost 10 MB :trophy:
9. Added TV Mode, right now you can use a **wider screen** to watch videos ! :tv: 
10. Added **Online DJ feature** !!! I really love this !!!! :rocket:

Right now we do connect people together with online DJ feature :+1: Time to invite your friends to join your own channel !!! Hope you guys like this version :smile:

Hi all ~ Finally we released Kaku 1.5.0 !! In this version, we did improve a lot of Kaku and added lots of awesome features : 
1. Rewrite the whole application with webpack :+1: 
2. Fixed snapshot problem for Vimeo Tracks :musical_note: 
3. Added world-wide Top tracking ! (It's true !!) :earth_asia: 
4. Translate App menu items to all different languages :symbols: 
5. Added Russian translation :ru: 
6. Added Portuguese translation :100: 
7. Added tooltip for tracks :hand: 
8. Added **Best Audio** option in Settings page to reduce your bandwidth !!! :open_mouth: 
9. Added **Always on Top** option in Settings page. :top: 
10. Increased search results to 50 items :ghost: 
11. Fixed unknown artist problem :microphone: 
12. Fixed MAX_LENGTH problem in Windows :angry: 

By the way, happy Mid-Autumn Festival :moon: :smile:

Hi all, we just released Kaku 1.1.0 !! Hope you guys love it :) 

Release notes : 
1. add SoundCloud searcher
2. add backup / sync feature (Local + Dropbox)
3. add Japanese translation 
4. add Download Manager
5. polish UI / fixed lots of small bugs
6. please use Cmd / Ctrl+D to download tracks instead.

Hi all, thanks for testing our Kaku beta and now I am happy to announce that 1.0.0 is released ! In 1.0.0, we have our official logo, support Vimeo searcher fixed many bugs for different platforms. Please upgrade Kaku to 1.0.0 and give it a try, thanks.

releases.name: Beta test for all users
releases.body:
This is the beta release for all users. If there is anything critical, we will release 1.0.0 soon :)
If there is any bug, please help to report to our issue tracker on GitHub, thanks !!
